scripts.clean:reports: rimraf allure-report allure-results && mkdirp allure-report allure-results
scripts.posttest: npm run generate:reports && npm run open:reports
scripts.test: npm run execute:script || npm run posttest
scripts.webTest: rimraf allure-report allure-results playwright-report && (npx playwright test --grep @Webst --reporter=line,allure-playwright || echo Playwright failed but continuing...) && npx allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report --single-file && npx allure open ./allure-report
scripts.bddSmokeTest: rimraf allure-report allure-results && cross-env-shell "npx cucumber-js --tags @Smoke || exit 0" && npx allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report --single-file && npx allure open ./allure-report
scripts.bddRegressionTest: rimraf allure-report allure-results && cross-env-shell "npx cucumber-js --tags @Regression || exit 0" && npx allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report --single-file && npx allure open ./allure-report
